definition: baldness/to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The cap passes close word, can accelerate the rate of trichomadesis.
sentences.chinese: 帽子过紧的话，会加快脱发的速度。

sentences.english: This article introduces professor Zhang Yuping's clinical experience.
sentences.chinese: 介绍张玉萍老师治疗脱发的临床经验。

sentences.english: A good example is Pantene Hair Fall Control.
sentences.chinese: 潘婷防脱发洗发水就是个很好的例子。

sentences.english: A chronic fungous infection which involves the sebaceous glands and hair follicles may result in alopecia.
sentences.chinese: 累及皮脂腺和毛囊的慢性真菌性感染都会引起脱发。

sentences.english: This article introduces the clinical experience in the treatment of androgenic alopecia.
sentences.chinese: 介绍中医辨证治疗雄激素源性脱发的临床经验。

sentences.english: The use of OCP alone has only a minimal effect in reducing alopecia .
sentences.chinese: 单独使用口服避孕药对减轻脱发只有很小的作用。

sentences.english: Most men are genetically predisposed to male pattern baldness.
sentences.chinese: 很多男人是遗传性的易患男性模式脱发。

sentences.english: Sometimes wearing hats and helmets too tightly can cause itchiness. Will that also lead to hair loss?
sentences.chinese: 帽子或头盔戴得过紧会头皮发痒，并造成脱发？

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the nursing care of hair-loss patients for scalps biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脱发患者头皮组织活检术的护理。

sentences.english: There are also medical treatments, such as chemo, which can cause a person to temporarily go bald.
sentences.chinese: 化疗等医学治疗也会引起人的暂时性脱发。

sentences.english: Capitis is one of the more common reasons for hair loss in children.
sentences.chinese: 头癣是一种较为常见的原因脱发的儿童。

sentences.english: Mr. Gou and his family were anxious about his hair loss.
sentences.chinese: 郭先生和家人一时陷入了脱发的不安当中。

sentences.english: I didn't know much about hair loss, but I know about propecia.
sentences.chinese: 我并不十分了解脱发，但是我知道保法止。

sentences.english: Still, we needed to get to the root of her problem.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们还要找到泰拉脱发问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: But the scientists stressed that tackling baldness was still many years away.
sentences.chinese: 但科学家们强调，解决脱发问题仍需很多年的时间。

sentences.english: The young man was starting to bald rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻人开始迅速脱发。

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
to stay up late or all night
grease/greasy food/oily/rich (of food)/fatty/greasy and dirty/a slippery character
